questions.question: Which action figure toy line, first introduced in the 1980s, featured characters from a fictional universe and included a popular animated TV series?
questions.correctAnswer: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe

questions.question: In the 1970s, this board game, where players buy and trade properties trying to bankrupt their opponents, saw a resurgence in popularity. What is it?
Which toy, introduced in the early 2000s, allows users to create 3D scribbles in the air using a plastic filament?
This interactive electronic toy from the late 90s responded to voice commands, allowing kids to feed and care for it virtually. What was it called?
What was the must-have toy of the 1985 holiday season, featuring a line of toys that transformed from vehicles and animals into robotic action figures?
Which of these was a popular collectible card game introduced in the early 1990s that involves two players who act as wizards casting spells on each other?
Released in 2001, which innovative console brought gaming to life with its dual-screen experience, one of which was touch-sensitive?
What was the must-have Christmas toy of 1978 that continued to be extremely popular throughout the early '80s, featuring a film cartridge that kids could watch on their own?
questions.correctAnswer: Kenner Star Wars Electronic Battle Command Game

questions.question: Which iconic puzzle toy, invented by a Hungarian architect, became a worldwide craze in the 1980s?
Which video game console, launched in the late '90s, brought 3D gaming into mainstream popularity and featured iconic titles like 'Super Mario 64'?
What was the name of the popular early 2000s toy that combined portable music players with digital pets?
What was the name of the video game console released by Nintendo in the 1980s that rejuvenated the video game industry?
Which handheld digital pet became a global phenomenon in the late 1990s?
Which electronic toy from the 1970s challenged players to repeat sequences of lights and sounds?
In the early 2000s, which interactive toy featured small robotic pets that scurried around on surfaces?
